# titleFont

**Instance Property**

The font used to draw cell’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var titleFont: NSFont { get set }
```

## Accessing a Cell’s Title

- **attributedTitle**: The title of the cell as an attributed string.
- **title**: The cell’s title text.
- **titleAlignment**: The alignment of the title.
- **titleBaseWritingDirection**: The default writing direction used to render the form cell’s title.
- **titleWidth**: The width of the title field.
